level.heading: Authority of Commissioner to issue rules and regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner may promulgate rules and regulations to implement the provisions of this chapter pursuant to subchapter I to Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Banking institutions organized under federal statute, application of District law, see ยง 26-710.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-308
level.text: For Law 13-308, see notes following ยง 26-431.01.
